body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

Spack installation of QT-5 is producing a build error on MacOS Big Sur with Xcode 13. The build and environment files are attached. 

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.3-4870-49354140be
* **Python:** 3.9.7
* **Platform:** darwin-bigsur-skylake
* **Concretizer:** clingo

### Additional information

maintainer : @sethrj 

[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7347974/spack-build-out.txt)

[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7347975/spack-build-env.txt)



### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: qt
